RmActionHook Class Reference

Extends Aria's ArAction so as to provide a means for hooking into the Pioneer robot event call chain. More...

Detailed Description

Extends Aria's ArAction so as to provide a means for hooking into the Pioneer robot event call chain.

Definition at line 13 of file RmActionHook.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

RmActionHook::RmActionHook (  RmActionHandler *  actionHandler  ) 
 

Sets up the given RmActionHandler as the handler for this particular hook into the robot event chain.

It will be called each time an Aria action event is fired.

Definition at line 6 of file RmActionHook.cpp.

Member Function Documentation

ArActionDesired * RmActionHook::fire (  ArActionDesired  currentDesired  )  [virtual]
 

The ArAction method that is called by the robot event chain to execute this particular action.

Dispatches the event to the RmActionHandler registered with this hook.
